sourcesContent:
<template>
  <u-chart ref="hc" constructor-type="mapChart" :options="options" :fetching="fetching" class="map" v-on="$listeners" />
</template>
<script>
  import UChart from '../UChart'

  export default {
    components: { UChart },
    props: {
      // the series data in the map
      series: { type: Array, required: true },

      fetching: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    },
    computed: {
      options() {
        return {
          chart: {
            map: 'worldMap',
            margin: 10,
            spacing: 0,
            backgroundColor: this.$vuntangle.theme === 'dark' ? '#1E1E1E' : '#FFFFFF',
          },
          plotOptions: {
            map: {
              borderColor: '#1e1e1e',
            },
          },
          title: { text: null },
          exporting: { enabled: false },
          credits: { enabled: false },
          mapNavigation: {
            enabled: true,
            buttonOptions: {
              verticalAlign: 'bottom',
            },
          },
          tooltip: {
            shared: true,
            split: false,
          },
          legend: {
            enabled: true,
            align: 'right',
          },
          series: this.series,
        }
      },
    },
  }
</script>
